name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Crystal clear audio quality.

name: Smart Watch
description: Feature-rich smartwatch with health tracking, notifications, and customizable watch faces.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand that improves posture and cooling. Adjustable height and angle.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with custom switches. Perfect for gaming and productivity.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Precision wireless mouse with ergonomic design and programmable buttons. 6-month battery life.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and power delivery support.

name: Phone Case
description: Premium protective phone case with anti-shock corners and raised camera protection.

name: Portable Charger
description: 20,000mAh portable charger with fast charging support. Charge multiple devices simultaneously.

name: Desk Lamp
description: Smart LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. USB charging port included.

name: Cable Organizer
description: Keep your cables organized and tangle-free with this silicone cable management solution.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour battery life.

name: Monitor Screen Protector
description: Anti-glare screen protector that reduces eye strain and protects your monitor from scratches.
